column5: percentFree :: FLOAT?)¦apoc.metrics.storage(directorySetting) - retrieve storage metrics about the devices Neo4j uses for data storage. directorySetting may be any valid neo4j directory setting name
column6: such as 'dbms.directories.data'.  If null is provided as a directorySetting
column7: you will get back all available directory settings.  For a list of available directory settings
column8: see the Neo4j operations manual reference on configuration settings.   Directory settings are **not** paths
column9: they are a neo4j.conf setting key name
